chapter.title: Wordcount sample using the Spring Framework
chapter.para: Please read the sample prerequistes before following these instructions.
chapter.section:
Introduction
This sample demonstrates how to execute a MapReduce application and a script that interacts with HDFS inside a Spring based application. It does not use spring Batch or Spring Integration.
The example code is located in the distribution directory <spring-hadoop-install-dir>/samples/basic/spring-wordcount.
